H0.text: What is the name of the island in Norway where over 80 people lost their lives to a gunman on 22nd July. Hovedøya

H1.text: What is the name of the island in Norway where over 80 people lost their lives to a gunman on 22nd July. Svalbard

H2.text: What is the name of the island in Norway where over 80 people lost their lives to a gunman on 22nd July. Tromsøya

H3.text: What is the name of the island in Norway where over 80 people lost their lives to a gunman on 22nd July. Utöya

A4.text: The 2011 Utøya mass shooting took place on the island.
